text: Paulo Eduardo Oliveira de Vilhena Moraes (born January 3, 1979) is a Brazilian actor and presenter. He started his career in 1998 on the television series Sandy & Junior, he was married to actress Thaila Ayala. Vilhena was born in Santos, São Paulo. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Movie Role Notes 1998–01 Sandy & Junior Gustavo Beltrão Season 1–3 2000–02 Vídeo Show Himself Presenter 2002 Coração de Estudante Fábio Vaz 2003 Agora É que São Elas Vitório Augusto Ramos Zabelheira Celebridade Paulo César Assunção 2004 Shark Tale Oscar Dubbing O Tesouro da Cidade Perdida Lisandro Movie 2005 A Lua Me Disse Adonias Goldoni 2006 Minha Nada Mole Vida Líber Mantovani Episode: Hipnose do Amor 2007 Paraíso Tropical Frederico Navarro (Fred) O Magnata André Movie 2008 Chega de Saudade Marquinhos Movie Casos e Acasos Wilson Episode: O Flagra, a Demissão e a Adoção Três Irmãs Eros Pascoli Pedreira 2009 Jogo Duro Himself Malhação Arthur Montenegro Quanto Dura o Amor?
